https://tmrev.io/movie/525673-Beaten by My Boyfriend 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yuQu70ZchevehCYLRi81yv1zhaG.jpg Stacey Dooley goes behind closed doors and speaks to the now younger face of domestic violence. She questions victims and abusers to try and understand how deep the issues surrounding domestic abuse are for those who have survived and those currently experiencing the abuse. Beaten by My Boyfriend
